price: "Bawalah semua kuda itu kembali kepadaku".  Lalu, ia potong kaki dan leher kuda itu 1302 b.
arabic: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسۡحَۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ
footnotes: 1302 b.  Sebagian mufasir mengatakan Nabi Sulaymān ‘Alaihissalām menyapu kaki dan leher kuda-kuda itu karena sayang terhadapnya.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ruddūhā ʿalayya faṭafiqa masḥan bil-sūqi wal-aʿnāqi
